EmailTemplate.name: RS Customer - Contract Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Solar Loan contract has been received!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Your BlueWave Solar Loan contract has been received. You will receive your fully executed contract from DocuSign shortly.
If you do not receive the fully executed contract in your email, or if you have any further questions, please contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or call us at (844) 786 - 4100 to access a member of our Customer Care team.
Thanks for joining us to make â€˜solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality. - All of us here at BlueWave
